content.rendered:
Roman is a Licensed Seagoing Engineer with MSc in Aeronautical Engineering and BSc in Mechanical Engineering. He has more than 20 years in the marine industry including Service in the United States Navy, Time at sea, Ashore as a fleet superintendent, Shore side experience as a California Maritime Academy professor casualty surveyor at DNV GL, General dry-dock experience Specialist knowledge in nuclear engineering and aviation.

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Major fires and equipment failure investigations
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert reports, expert opinion

Contact

Seattle, WA | +1 206 499 2691
